pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models

Class ChunkDataSetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.DataSetBuilder
      • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.models.ChunkDataSetBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardDataSetBuilder

    public abstract class ChunkDataSetBuilder
extends DataSetBuilder
    Data set builder that processes commits in chunks separated by bug-fixes. The last commit in a chunk is considered most bug-prone and every previous one is assigned a lower value. Providing multiple bug-proneness scores is possible by adding multiple bug-proneness measures to the builder.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki

        Build model instances from a given method history. Prior to calling this method, builder should be supplied with all commits referenced by this method's history.

                                     boolean isFixed)
        Process a chunk of method versions.
        Parameters:
        versions - Method versions to be processed
        lastFix - Information about last fix before this chunk (null if the given chunk is the fist one in a method history)
